DOC.brief_summary: Burnout patients show deficient working memory functioning. Several studies showed a training can increase working memory capacity. In the current study we explored whether training working memory can reduce burnout and burnout related symptoms and increase working memory capacity.
DOC.brief_title: A Working Memory Training in Burnout Patients
DOC.criteria: undifferentiated somatoform disorder with a work related cause age which exceeded the range of 18 to 67 years a severe major depressive episode substance dependence or abuse
